title: Momeny By Moment
presentation: v1 c v2 c v3 c v4 c v5 c

v1: Dying with Jesus, by death reckon'd mine;
Living with Jesus a new life divine;
Looking to Jesus till glory does shine,
Moment by moment, O Lord, I am Thine.
v2: Never a battle with wrong for the right,
Never a contest that He does not fight;
Lifting above us His banner so bright;
Moment by moment I'm kept in His sight.
v3: Never a trial that He is not there,
Never a burden that He does not bear;
Never a sorrow that He does not share,
Moment by moment, I'm under His care.
v4: Never a heartache, and never a groan,
Never a teardrop and never a moan;
Never a danger but there on the throne
Moment by moment He thinks of His own.
v5: Never a weakness that He does not feel,
Never a sickness that He cannot heal;
Moment by moment, in woe or in weal,
Jesus, my Savior, abides with me still.
c1: Moment by moment I'm kept in His love,
Moment by moment I've life from above;
Looking to Jesus till glory does shine;
Moment by moment, O Lord, I am Thine.
